source: Mesade de neiq pepahangngi umba noa caranan virus corona mellele.
Indediq virus mellele moaq diang to tibarassi
Dako sikadukku beka pano tau. Moaq meloq tau amang Annaq uqde tau naroa elunna pano sola muaq tibarassi, dako sikdukku beka pano, allaqi sudangmmeteq.
Aka deneiq namu babe muaq mangita tau to seqdeng, to tibarassi:
BENGNGI PANO MASKER. Jari mala kasiq tibarassi/Seqdeng laling di maskerna annaq malai mappasalamaq rupa tau.
Uqde kapang masaski/mapiqdi indo tau. Napaparoa kalettuneiq kalaena annaq uqde naroa indeqe piqdiq.

Akaq indo to naleleimi inde piqdiq, uqde leqbaq tiqi nadiang nita pano makkuallaq-allaq dibatang kalaena. Aka deneiq memmanya-manya tau akaq indo pano tonaleleimi inde piqdi, mala toi neiq mambahaang piqdi pano rupa tau.
Aka deneiq, dako pano di tomaroaq, akaq uqdemi muissang mennami inde pano pesalasaohongang mamanya kasiq masaki/mapiqdiq.
Moa umba noa, akaq mala toi elunna sola mendekkeq pano ...
Anna rupanna pano rupa tau to musikadukkuang,
Muaq uqde mutumbanga mangatti indo pano barang-barang, annaq muatti bumi rupammu kalaemu.
Mesa kale deneiq mala nipogau annaq mala malai indeq pidiq, anna mala mate inde pambaha piqdi. akami indoqo, nibasei annaq nisabungngi, mala toi nipake indo pano anu mala mepamapute, annaq alkohol.
Indediq piqdiq nakulle tuho pano dinahang sambengi sangallo (24 jam) pano diahona barang-barang.
aka nipogauq annaq malai malai inde piqdiq.
Baseiqi, mappake tau sabung tandaq dinde.
Da muroa pano rupammua.(Anna rupanna pano/lako rupa tau.) Muaq uqderangngia namala uqde nanipogauq, yaq nibasei kalemi tajeta ingga mapaccinna, annaq nisabunggi toi.
Sitteng masaena muaq makkelong tau “Happy Birthday” pendeqdua.
Umba noa cara mambasei taje annaq mala mapaccing sisiqda?
Muaq muroari palakang, dako tappa rabang. Aka deneiq tappa pano mi tau nibasei tajetaq anna nipakeang toi sabung.
Akaq inde piqdi mala menjari maiqdi illaing di masker muaq masae beka nipake.
Tibei maskermu muaq sarupuqmi musaqding. Da mulewaqi sangallo mupake maskermu.
Dako passolai ande, andeang, gallas/kaca, annaq handuq
Akaq de mala naniroa rupatta muaq sikkung kalaetaq. Pogauqmi ...
Muaq malai, muaq mambokaqi tau baqba, atau nani oppoq, mala ari sikkutta atau paleppetta nipake.
Mambaca tau artikel annaq cara-carana anna detau naroa piqdiq.
This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz
The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe"

source: Penngissangngiqi naia nioaang Virus Corona    Mesade de neiq pepahangngi umba noa caranan virus corona mellele.   Sua Pudung Mata Mettama laling To magassing To masaki Indediq virus mellele moaq diang to tibarassi Dako sikadukku beka pano tau. Moaq meloq tau amang Annaq uqde tau naroa elunna pano sola muaq tibarassi, dako sikdukku beka pano, allaqi sudangmmeteq. 1 2m - 0,5m Haaachii!! Aka deneiq namu babe muaq mangita tau to seqdeng, to tibarassi: BENGNGI PANO MASKER. Jari mala kasiq tibarassi/Seqdeng laling di maskerna annaq malai mappasalamaq rupa tau. 2 Tarima kasih “SROOT” Mala tobande Uqde kapang masaski/mapiqdi indo tau. Napaparoa kalettuneiq kalaena annaq uqde naroa indeqe piqdiq. Akaq indo to naleleimi inde piqdiq, uqde leqbaq tiqi nadiang nita pano makkuallaq-allaq dibatang kalaena. Aka deneiq memmanya-manya tau akaq indo pano tonaleleimi inde piqdi, mala toi neiq mambahaang piqdi pano rupa tau.   Aka deneiq, dako pano di tomaroaq, akaq uqdemi muissang mennami inde pano pesalasaohongang mamanya kasiq masaki/mapiqdiq. Andeang To Magassing Pettuqgalanganna kereta Pepesseqna lif Palluqluq/ Tissu Kaca/gallas Pareba digital Annaq disulihanna masker Pettuqgalangan endeq Mos Polopeng Ahona baqba Tajena Moa umba noa, akaq mala toi elunna sola mendekkeq pano ... Namasaki/namapiqdiq nasakkoaq Anna rupanna pano rupa tau to musikadukkuang, Mupojoqi matammu Muaq uqde mutumbanga mangatti indo pano barang-barang, annaq muatti bumi rupammu kalaemu. Mesa kale deneiq mala nipogau annaq mala malai indeq pidiq, anna mala mate inde pambaha piqdi. akami indoqo, nibasei annaq nisabungngi, mala toi nipake indo pano anu mala mepamapute, annaq alkohol. Indediq piqdiq nakulle tuho pano dinahang sambengi sangallo (24 jam) pano diahona barang-barang. Sabung aka nipogauq annaq malai malai inde piqdiq. Akade neiq pengissangngi mating Baseiqi, mappake tau sabung tandaq dinde. Sabung Sikkung Da muroa pano rupammua.(Anna rupanna pano/lako rupa tau.) Muaq uqderangngia namala uqde nanipogauq, yaq nibasei kalemi tajeta ingga mapaccinna, annaq nisabunggi toi. Sitteng masaena muaq makkelong tau “Happy Birthday” pendeqdua. Kanikimmu Paling masaemi muaq 20 detik Allaqna pano kareme tajemu Basei ahona tajemu Umba noa cara mambasei taje annaq mala mapaccing sisiqda? Muaq muroari palakang, dako tappa rabang. Aka deneiq tappa pano mi tau nibasei tajetaq anna nipakeang toi sabung. Da muroai ahona (Sulihanna) maskermu Merassiqi uhai elu Akaq inde piqdi mala menjari maiqdi illaing di masker muaq masae beka nipake. Tibei maskermu muaq sarupuqmi musaqding. Da mulewaqi sangallo mupake maskermu. Mappake seruq dokkaju tau Anaq Ambe Indo Handuqta toi kitaq nipake Dako passolai ande, andeang, gallas/kaca, annaq handuq Akaq de mala naniroa rupatta muaq sikkung kalaetaq. Pogauqmi ... Muaq malai, muaq mambokaqi tau baqba, atau nani oppoq, mala ari sikkutta atau paleppetta nipake. Sapo Wattuttaq messohong di sapo Uru naummandetaq Semat basei tajetaq mappake sabung... Paccappuranna, Sabung Mala arattau sehaq asang! Mala arattau sehaq asang! Sabung Mambaca tau artikel annaq cara-carana anna detau naroa piqdiq. This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz
